titleStmt.title: His Majesties speech spoken to the mayor, aldermen, and commonaltie of the citie of Oxford, and to the high sheriffes of the counties of Oxford and Berks, with divers justices of peace in the said counties, at a generall summons requesting their assistance by contribution of money, plate, and horses, towards the supportment of his present wars.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
